Name: To create a common language for interaction between programmers and specialists in the subject area
Names should describe the purpose and result
Names should not describe how they perform their functions
intention-revealing interface means that public class names and methods are sufficient to use the component
it is not necessary to delve into the internal arrangement of classes
Terms cover all the phenomena of the domain associated with the program being implemented
The concepts should not contradict each other
Unambiguous interpretation of concepts and terms
Language of specialists in the subject area
